website_summaries.verdict: Nicely designed gloves with extra fabric in the stress areas and breathable materials elsewhere.
pros: Thick Velcro strap that's easy to grab and adjust when you're in the batter's box
Lightweight gloves that still give you a nice level of durability
Single piece in the palm area, which means you don't have to worry about seams
You can choose from five different color options and multiple youth sizes
Using gray as a base color means these gloves will match many uniforms
cons: With the extra material in stress areas, the gloves don't quite flex as easily as some others

customer_reviews.title: Fit a big snug but good
customer_reviews.text: These run small. Bought them in a large for my 11 year old son and they fit him but snug. I wanted him to have a little room for growth. He is average height and on the slender side so I know it’s the glove and not his hands being too big. Quality seems pretty standard and he likes them, especially the color.
customer_reviews.author: S-Ro

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and worn every game and last the whole season with no rips or tears
customer_reviews.author: michelle ritter

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but my son is getting blisters from them
customer_reviews.text: We decided to go from the Mizuno MVP Batting Glove to this one but it's going to just end up collecting dust now since my son is getting blisters from these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new set of batting gloves for an ever growing child. These look great and fit great!
customer_reviews.author: McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A little prices but that how sports products go. He will even be able to wear them next year.
customer_reviews.author: Narisha Ditmore

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice glove. I was expecting a little more padding in the palm but my son said it works good and reduced the shock of hitting the ball!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lee

customer_reviews.title: They have not lasted long.
customer_reviews.text: My son has only used these a handful of times so far and they are already broken. The strap has come completely off.
customer_reviews.author: FThomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and fit for my almost 7 year old
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: seems a lil snug but look awesome maybe they will stretch a lil
customer_reviews.author: J brock

customer_reviews.title: My son’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: We had these before and have now purchased the next size up. These fit well and help protect my son’s hands from blisters. We’ve tried other gloves, but they were too thin (more expensive) and did not give the same protection. We will continue to buy these for him as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: J Sue

customer_reviews.title: Glove doesn't mention that it is youth size.
customer_reviews.text: This glove is a youth glove. I bought this as a gift, and thought it was an adult size. The description is so deceptive and vague. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: ADULT  SIZE FOR  GRAND  CHILDREN
customer_reviews.text: I SHOULD HAVE PURCHASED ADULT SIZE, MY GRANDSON IS A SENIOR PLAYING VARSITY BALL.. MY ERROR, JIMMY
customer_reviews.author: JIMMY GERWIG

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo likes these. Very good grip and he likes the color too. Good gloves
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: These are youth gloves
customer_reviews.text: No where in the description did it say these gloves were youth gloves. Very deceiving. Will not order through this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves out there
customer_reviews.text: Well made, double stitching, provides good protection, and still look new after a season.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Material is high-quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fit... Grips bat very well. Material is high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good batting gloves
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old son loves these gloves. He's the biggest kid on his team. There's no sizing chart here, but I saw the sizing chart for a pair of Franklin batting gloves so I measured his hand and got the medium. The small would have been too small. They're a little long in the finger but that's okay. Hopefully they'll last and if so he'll be able to wear them next season too.
customer_reviews.author: Will

product_meta.title: Rawlings Youth 5150 Batting Gloves
product_meta.description:
These 5150 batting gloves feature a durable goat skin leather palm with a digi camo flexfit backing. The double knit lycra finger gussets create an enhanced fit. Genuine goat leather palm for comfort and durability FlexFit heathered material creates an unrestricted feel throughout swing Double-knit Lycra finger gussets create an enhanced fit

feature_bullets: Right Hand Throw = Left Hand Glove, Left Hand Throw = Right Hand Glove
